Pre-Game Insights: England, led by Jos Buttler, aims to commence the tournament with a victory, while New Zealand, without captain Kane Williamson, seeks to start on a winning note.
New Zealand's captain Kane Williamson is returning to the team after an injury during IPL 2023, with his fitness being crucial for their World Cup preparations.
Both teams feature star players, including Jos Buttler, Liam Livingstone, Ben Stokes for England, and Trent Boult, Lockie Ferguson, Tom Latham for New Zealand.
In their previous encounter in the 2019 World Cup final, England secured a thrilling Super Over win against New Zealand.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad has a mix of black and red soil pitches, offering varying conditions for bowlers.
The match will be live-streamed on Hotstar and Star Sports Network.
Others: The article provides match details, playing XIs, pitch reports, and head-to-head statistics, which are essential for understanding the context of the game.
